eightdir.description_zh: 允许对象朝上下左右，及对角线方向移动。
eightdir.description_en: Moves an object up, down, left, right and on diagonals.

anchor.description_zh: 简单将对象固定在可视区域内，不会随镜头移动。
anchor.description_en: Position objects relative to the viewport.

bound.description_zh: 阻止对象超出场景边界范围。
bound.description_en: Stop an object leaving the layout.

bullet.description_zh: 以当前角度向前移动对象。通常用于子弹和抛射物。
bullet.description_en: Move an object ahead at its current angle.  Typically used for bullets and projectiles.

car.description_zh: 通过方向盘移动对象，模拟驾驶的体验。
car.description_en: Moves an object forwards with steering.

custom.description_zh: 使用最底层的移动方式，执行自定义移动功能。
custom.description_en: Make your own movement using low-level movement functions.

destroy.description_zh: 对象超出场景范围时自动销毁。
destroy.description_en: Automatically destroy the object if it leaves the layout area.

dragndrop.description_zh: 通过鼠标或触摸拖放对象
dragndrop.description_en: Drag and drop objects either by mouse or touch.

fade.description_zh: 在一段时间内逐渐改变对象的不透明度，适用于让对象逐渐出现/消失。
fade.description_en: Change an object's opacity over time.  Useful for making objects gradually disappear.

flash.description_zh: 使对象闪烁，不断地出现和隐去
flash.description_en: Make an object temporarily flash, alternately becoming visible and invisible.

jumpthru.description_zh: 让平台行为识别此对象为实体，也允许从上下两端穿透而过。
jumpthru.description_en: A solid the Platform behavior can also jump on to from underneath.

los.description_zh: 让对象可以看见某个位置或其他对象。
los.description_en: Test if an object has line of sight to (if it can "see") an object or position.

nosave.description_zh: 对于系统存档功能，允许不保存此对象数据，保持场景初始状态。适用于静态的场景物体，有助于减小存档文件占用空间并提升加载速度。
nosave.description_en: Don't save or load this object, e.g. for static scenery. Helps make savegames smaller and quicker to load.

pathfinding.description_zh: 寻找前往某个位置的路线并绕过途径的障碍物。
pathfinding.description_en: Find paths around obstacles, and optionally move along them.

conditions.name_zh: 检查单元格位置存在障碍物

actions.name_zh: 重新生成物体周围的区域

persist.description_zh: 允许此对象的实例对象在场景中保留当前的状态，在重新进入场景时不会重置为初始状态。
persist.description_en: Make instances of this object remember their state when returning to the layout, rather than resetting to the initial objects.

physics.description_zh: 模拟真实的物理行为，基于 Box2D 技术驱动。
physics.description_en: Simulate realistic object physics, powered by Box2D.

pin.description_zh: 与另一个对象保持相对的距离和角度。
pin.description_en: Stick to another object maintaining a relative distance and angle.

conditions.name_zh: 与被固定的对象一起被销毁

actions.name_zh: 设置与固定的对象一起被销毁

platform.description_zh: 允许可以在添加了 '实体 / 跳跃穿透行为' 的平台上跳跃和奔跑。
platform.description_en: Jump and run along platforms (solid/jump-thru objects).

scrollto.description_zh: 始终将画面对焦到此对象的位置。若有多个对象添加此行为，则对准它们的中心点。
scrollto.description_en: Always center the view on this object, or at the mid-point of multiple objects.

shadowcaster.description_zh: 搭配 '投影光' 对象类型使用，让对象能被 '投影光' 对象投射阴影。
shadowcaster.description_en: Make the object cast a shadow away from a Shadow Light object.

sin.description_zh: 根据正弦曲线的波形变化，调整对象的相关属性，用来创造一些有趣的视觉效果。
sin.description_en: Adjust an object's position, size, angle or other properties with an oscillating sine wave.

solid.description_zh: 使对象不能被其他对象穿透，其他对象在撞击刚体对象时无法移动或者跌落。
solid.description_en: Make the object impassable, so other objects cannot move or fall through it.

timer.description_zh: 允许实例管理多个计时器工作。
timer.description_en: Manage multiple timers which work per instance.

turret.description_zh: 在射程范围内寻找目标，并朝向目标射击。
turret.description_en: Detect objects in range, rotating towards them and firing.

wrap.description_zh: 让对象超出场景范围时可以重新出现在另一侧。
wrap.description_en: Make an object leaving the layout reappear on the other side.

tilemovement.description_en: Moves an object around a 2D grid.

tween.description_zh: 让对象的属性在一段时间内逐渐变化。
tween.description_en: Animate the properties of an object over time

actions.name_zh: 设置播放完成后销毁 (全部)

orbit.description_zh: 使对象环绕一个位置沿椭圆轨迹运动。
orbit.description_en: Make an object move along an ellipse around a position.

moveto.description_zh: 让对象移动到指定的位置，具有移动速度的属性。
moveto.description_en: Move an object to a position with an acceleration and deceleration.

actions.name_zh: 沿着时间轴移动(根据名称)

follow.description_zh: 根据时间或距离跟踪另一个物体的运动。
follow.description_en: Follow the movement of another object, either by time or distance.
